listing.listing_description:
Quartz Mountain is a fabulous Paradise Valley villa outside Scottsdale, situated just two minutes on foot from the famed Paradise Valley Country Club. The newly built, 7,000-square-foot home enjoys breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain, while its impressive amenities include a large outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, indoor and outdoor kitchens, and an excellent home office. With a superb master suite and six ample guestrooms with queen beds, Quartz Mountain is an ideal choice for families, corporate retreats, destination wedding guests, and golf vacations with friends.

The villa's outdoor living areas inspire festive occasions or tranquil relaxation in the dreamy desert air. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and sunbathe on lounge chairs on the terrace. Fire up the grill for an afternoon barbeque, and dine alfresco in the mellowing light. Sip wine and cocktails by the fire pit at sunset, and relish a soak in the hot tub under the spectacular stars.

The villa’s interiors are beautifully designed to create a graceful flow of space between rooms. The living room features a large, flat-screen TV, a fireplace, and comfortable seating under lovely wood ceiling beams. Gourmets will adore the capacious kitchen, featuring expansive prep space, top-of-the-line appliances, a long bar, an attached service kitchen, a wine and cocktail niche, a large pantry, and a casual dining table for eight. The elegant formal dining room features a table for ten under gorgeous chandeliers, a salon area with fireplace, and doors to a patio with fountain. The villa also features a fitness room and cozy media room, and there is air conditioning throughout.

The lovely master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and deluxe vanity. Each of the six guestrooms features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom.

In addition to being just steps from Paradise Valley Country Club, the villa is within five to ten minutes by car from several world-class resorts and sport clubs, including Camelback Golf Club, The Phoenician, and Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club. Scottsdale is only six miles away, and you're a short drive from Echo Canyon Recreation Area. Downtown Phoenix is about thirteen miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beech trees are a blaze of green in the windows of this Shingle-inspired manse on the grounds of Amagansett’s former Bell estate. The home’s country-chic sloping roof and eyebrow window are set on nearly 2 private acres, and its crisp white rooms turn green and gold as sunlight bounces off the leaves. It’s 1 mile to the bay and 2 miles to sand and concession stands on the town’s ocean beaches.

Summer means swimming in the 60-foot pool that stretches across the backyard, taking breaks for popsicles at the picnic table by the water or burgers from the barbecue at the alfresco dining table on the stone patio.

Bay windows and French doors make the great room feel like an extension of the patio, as light filters through beech leaves and dapples the hardwood floors and white sofas. The space invites you to settle in around its dining table, breakfast nook, or the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen; for a quiet moment, there’s also a reading nook tucked behind the fireplace, and for special occasions, there’s a formal dining room.

The villa’s location near the ocean means you’re just a 2-mile drive from Amagansett’s popular beaches, which are favorites with visitors and locals alike for their broad stretches of sand and snack stands. You’re also close to town, where you’ll find great shopping—keep an eye out for summer pop-ups—and must-try dining ranging from fresh seafood to creative Mexican.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Secret worlds wait behind the modern façade of this mansion just outside Orlando. Part of the Reunion gated resort community, this villa looks like any other in its quiet neighborhood, but inside, it’s full of themed rooms, a home theatre, and games rooms for kids of all ages.

If you’ve come to Florida to escape the winter, bask in the warmth in a screened-in pool area with hot tub, ping-pong table, and outdoor kitchen. After a day on the golf course or at the theme parks, host a family movie night in the home theatre, face off in the sports-themed arcade room, fire up the karaoke machine, or stay up late playing pool and poker.

From the entry, you’ll see a sleek, open-concept living area whose polished stone floors and chrome accents lend plenty of contemporary cool. The vibe continues in the fully equipped kitchen and dining area, where there’s plenty of seating at the breakfast bar and dining table.

Keep your imagination going with a day at Disney World, only 12 minutes away by car. It’s also an easy drive to Universal Studios.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite mountain villa is located on Camas Loop within the prestigious Elkhorn Community near Sun Valley Resort, with access to the community’s swimming pools, tennis club, and spa facilities. The home features ample, wrap-around terraces with alfresco dining and sublime sunset and sunrise views, including a breathtaking prospect of Bald Mountain, while its superbly appointed interiors include high-end media features, three fireplaces, and a gourmet kitchen. A deluxe master suite and two ample guest suites accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.

The modern home blends vintage Rocky Mountain charm with superb contemporary comforts and gallery-worthy artwork. The large living room features high, vaulted ceilings of exposed natural wood, a beautiful stone hearth with wood-burning fireplace, and expansive windows that flood the home with alpine light. There is an interior dining table for eight as well as alfresco dining on the expansive deck. The open kitchen will inspire the gourmets among your party, with chef-grade appliances, generous prep space, a wine fridge, and a breakfast bar. Heating and air conditioning keep you comfortable in all seasons, and there is a home office for work or study.

The bedrooms offer lovely private havens for cozy downtime and rest. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with shower and jetted tub. The two guestrooms share a bathroom between them: one includes a king bed and walk-in closet, while the other has a queen bed.

The Elkhorn Community offers an ideal location for enjoying the unique riches of Sun Valley. Play golf at Elkhorn Golf Club, enjoy the community's pools and tennis courts in the summer, and soothe your muscles in the sauna and steam room. Beyond Elkhorn, you’re just six minutes from Dollar Mountain, eight minutes from Bald Mountain, and four miles from River Run at Sun Valley Resort—easily accessible by car or the free shuttle service. Downtown Ketchum is about four miles away, where you'll find superb dining, Magic Lantern Cinemas, and much more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designed for entertaining in full view of the mountains, Clowsgill Holme is the perfect retreat for a family reunion or fun-filled holiday with friends. This custom log home features spacious yet cozy interiors, plenty of picture windows and finely wrought post and beam construction. Its location on Baldy Mountain is only minutes from skiing, hiking, biking, the quaint town of Breckenridge and more, putting you close to the Colorado outdoors any time of year.

After a day on the trails, leave gear in the mudroom and watch the sunset from the villa’s private deck, which has a barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight and a hot tub. If it’s too chilly outside, opt for a snug evening indoors by the glow of the fireplace and flat-screen television.

Clowsgill Holme pairs rustic elements with modern furnishings for comfortable yet stylish interiors. Thick wooden beams and a stone fireplace fill the living room with natural texture, while tufted leather sofas are soft and inviting. Both the pedestal table in the formal dining area and the farmhouse-inspired table in the breakfast nook have views of the mountains. And the fully equipped kitchen has both on-trend granite countertops and state-of-the-art appliances.

The five bedrooms at this luxury vacation rental can accommodate up to fourteen guests. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including a plush master suite with its own fireplace and steam shower, and two that share a hall bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature weighty wood beams from British Columbia redwoods and floors in warm-toned reclaimed wood.

The villa’s perch on Baldy Mountain is only 10 minutes from the nearest ski area and steps from cross-country, hiking and biking trails. Bring the family to Carter Park for sledding and tubing, or your sweetheart to Breckenridge’s historic downtown for a honeymoon-style stroll past shops and restaurants. For warm-weather guests, the Breckenridge Golf Club is just a short drive from Clowsgill Holme.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Please note that there are ongoing construction projects near this home. For more information, please speak with your Villa Specialist.

listing.listing_description:
You won’t have to look far for gorgeous views and luxury amenities at Lookout Lodge. From its picturesque Steamboat Springs setting, this custom log home offers mountain vistas stretching from west to south. Its 6,500 square feet of beautifully appointed living space are designed for entertaining, and its five bedrooms can welcome up to sixteen family members or friends.

After a day out in the mountains of Colorado, return to your vacation rental to enjoy the sunset from the rooftop deck, dinner from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining table or a soak in the private outdoor hot tub. There’s also a loft with a pool table and wet bar, a family room with a flat-screen television and its own wet bar, and a home theater with a 108-inch screen and tiered seating.

The lodge’s spacious interiors pair classic mountain chalet style with state-of-the-art features. The great room, ideal for lounging or a casual meal, is anchored by a massive stone fireplace and boasts panoramic views. It’s open to a fully equipped kitchen with professional-grade appliances, which leads to a dining room set underneath an impressive log truss and a family room with its own fireplace and mountain views.

The five bedrooms at Lookout Lodge are spread out over the main and lower levels, making each a quiet, spacious retreat. Relive your honeymoon in one of two bedrooms with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one of which also has its own balcony. There are two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom, and for children, there’s a bunk room with two bunk beds.

Your holiday at the lodge includes on-call seasonal shuttle service, making the 1.6-mile drive to Steamboat Ski Resort a snap. The property is also less than 10 minutes from the Rollingstone Ranch golf course and City Market. Be sure to leave time for a splash in the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town or a soak in the beautiful stone pools of Strawberry Park Hot Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay in a mid-century icon at Villa Sierra. With its streamlined architecture, glam interiors and mountain views, this Desert Cities vacation rental is the quintessential Palm Springs residence. Its four bedrooms and 5,300 square feet of space can welcome groups of up to eight in vintage-inspired luxury.

This California-cool ranch home opens to equally stylish outdoor living areas with a 75-foot pool, hot tub, wet bar, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. On cooler desert nights, gather around one of the three firepits and watch the shapes of the mountains turn to silhouettes, or settle in around the wet bar and pool table in the chic indoor lounge and games room. (Keep an eye out for a limited-edition Clairtone stereo that’s the same model Sonny and Cher had in their Palm Springs home.)

Relaxing amid the villa’s collection of vintage and global furnishings is like stretching out in a magazine spread. Two lounge areas, including one with a wet bar, invite you to mix cocktails and settle in for a chat. The fabulous pistachio-green, fully equipped kitchen has a smoked-glass breakfast table, and there’s a separate formal dining room that seats eight friends or family in playful pink chairs.

Villa Sierra has one master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with queen beds; all four have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms exude a decadent mid-century-meets-Hollywood Regency vibe—think slipper chairs, chandeliers and mirrored panels.

Spend your holiday soaking in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The villa is just a 5-minute drive from downtown Palm Springs, where you can take architectural tours by day and sit down to honeymoon-worthy dinners by night. For avid golfers, there are two courses nearby; for non-players, there’s the inspiring Moorten Botanical Garden and the Palm Springs Art Museum.

Palm Springs City ID: 4037

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy a Mediterranean-style getaway in the shadow of California’s Santa Rosa Mountains at Cappella. Inspired by Mission architecture, this charming Desert Cities vacation rental has Old World elegance in a setting close to golf, shopping, dining and the Coachella festival grounds. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property for a sunny holiday with extended family or a golf trip with friends.

Soak in the desert sunshine (or relax in the cool of the shade) in the villa’s backyard, which features a pool and spillover spa, a terrace with loungers, a putting green and a firepit. A breezeway has a shaded sitting area, and the built-in outdoor kitchen has a barbecue, mini-fridge, sink and bar seating. You’ll find even more al-fresco living space on the second-floor balcony. If you’d prefer to entertain in the air conditioning, gather around the wet bar or grand piano for a memorable evening.

The great room of Cappella opens to a courtyard with a sitting area via rows of french doors, creating an indoor-outdoor living space that feels seamless. In the open-plan living and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen, details such as vaulted and beamed ceilings, a stately fireplace surround and floor-length drapes create a sophisticated, European-inspired look.

Cappella has three bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite and one with two queen beds; all four have private en-suite bathrooms. The master suite also has a sleeper sofa and rollaway double bed, perfect for a family traveling with younger children. A second king bedroom is located in an attached casita and could double as a honeymoon-style retreat.

With six golf courses within 25 miles of the villa, Cappella is a golfer’s dream. If you’re not an avid player, browse the shops at nearby Old Town La Quinta, find shopping and dining in downtown Indio and Palm Desert, or take a day trip to Palm Springs or Joshua Tree National Park. Visitors in town for a music festival or tennis tournament will find the Coachella grounds less than a 10-minute drive away and Indian Wells less than 10 miles away.

City ID # LIC-765166

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Looking for late-nights with great friends? This modern villa in the Melrose neighborhood has the layout to get the party started. Dine outside, where the double-sided fireplace partially separates the alfresco setting from the pool/hot tub lounge. Take your drink for a walk and mingle, flowing-freely from inside to out. Later, move the party a few minutes uptown to the Sunset Strip.

Lush hedges outline the open-air main level of this modern-contemporary home, making sure your VIPs enjoy a secluded environment. Floor-to-ceiling openings link the pool deck, lawns, and outdoor lounge areas to the open-concept main floor, where creamy-tones set a calming atmosphere. Inside, state of the art tech-features and a chef-worthy kitchen show off Melrose’s modern side, while gorgeous marble and ornate fixtures add that classic-Hollywood elegance. On less formal occasions, fire up the barbecue, grab a drink and get the big game on the terrace TV.

Wake up early and start your day with a long walk across Venice Beach. When you’re ready for breakfast, you’ll find dozens of bakeries and patio restaurants on the streets just off the sand. After a morning coffee and a croissant, meander through the Venice neighborhood’s boutique shops to find the perfect souvenir. Still in the mood to shop? Rodeo Drive is just a few minutes from home. And, if you’re traveling with kids, do a little thrill-seeking on the rides at Universal Studios or Santa Monica Pier.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax beside the fireplace and recount stories of an exciting day on the mountain while you gaze upon it from this modern-ski lodge in Ketchum. Rejuvenate in the hot tub before dinner, and then rejoin the group at the formal dining table. Then, compose some after-dinner music on the piano or rally the troops for a night out in Ketchum. Sawtooth Brewery has a great selection of local craft brews.

 Hygge House is a fresh take on the traditional ski-lodge, borrowing design elements from the Danish, and mixing them with familiar Mid-Century modern decor. Flow from the fireplace lounge to the kitchen’s bar, and on to the dining area, all while enjoying the mountain view. Warm wood tones set the kitchen apart from the rest of the interior. Downstairs, the kids will love the family room’s cozy vibe.

 On nights in, Hygge House is ready to host. Turn up the sound system, pick a bottle from the wine fridge, and organize a pool tournament in the game room. After, put the big game on the television and cheer on your team in the living room. When it’s late, take the all-nighters out to the hot tub and enjoy the stars while you finish off your evening.

 Within 8 miles, you’ll have access to skiing at Dollar Mountain, River Run, and Bald Mountain. In the summer, the course at Elkhorn Golf Club is a great way to explore the rugged mountain landscape. The kids will love Magic Lantern Cinema and the ice skating rink at Atkinson Park. And, the older kids will appreciate Elkhorn’s vibrant nightlife.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Festival-goers, golf fanatics and sun-seekers will find plenty to love at Lawrence Estate. Only minutes from the Coachella grounds, several golf courses and outdoor shopping and dining at picturesque Old Town La Quinta, this luxury Desert Cities vacation rental is large enough to host the whole family or a group of friends. For guests who just want to soak in the California sun, there’s a gorgeous outdoor living area.

Step through the gates of Lawrence Estate to discover a private backyard with a heated pool, hot tub, and lounging and sitting areas in both shade and sun. Sip refreshments from the wet bar, play lawn games, heat up the barbecue, enjoy dinner at the al-fresco table and linger into the evening around the firepit or outdoor fireplace. Inside, a premium sound system and games room with shuffleboard, foosball and ping-pong will provide hours of fun for kids and grown-ups alike.

The villa’s tiled roof, stucco exterior and single-story layout have classic Southwestern charm. But inside, you’ll find bright, airy rooms with mod flair. The open-plan living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen encourage guests to gather in the same space and spend quality time together. Details like brass light fixtures, a plush Beni Ourain–style rug, iconic Round dining chairs and beautiful stone backsplash tiles invite a closer look.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at Lawrence Estate and one in the guest house. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite that opens to the terrace. Parents on holiday with children will want to claim the other two bedrooms, which each have a queen bed and share a bathroom. The guest house, with its king bed and en-suite bathroom, could be used as a secluded honeymoon suite or tranquil retreat for the in-laws.

The villa’s location in Indio puts you close to music festivals, the Empire Polo Club and Indian Wells Tennis Garden, and a concierge can help arrange event tickets. They are also happy to help with tee times at one of the nearby country clubs or dinner reservations at local restaurants. For a memorable day trip, drive to Palm Springs and admire the mid-century architecture, take in the views from the Mount San Jacinto tramway or marvel at the otherworldly scenery in Joshua Tree National Park.

City ID # 18-00023058

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Dramatic mountain views take center stage at Governors Penthouse 401. From your perch in the heart of downtown Steamboat Springs, take in beautiful vistas of the Yampa River, Howelsen Hill and Emerald Mountain. Spend your holiday skiing, golfing, rafting or soaking in the town’s namesake hot springs. At the end of a day of the outdoor adventures in Colorado, bliss out with this vacation rental’s luxury amenities and and three bedrooms.

Leave your car in the underground parking space and let the elevator whisk you up to the penthouse, where a sprawling private deck awaits. On warmer nights, prepare dinner on the barbecue, sit down at the al-fresco dining area and end the evening with a marshmallow roast over the firepit; when it’s colder outside, enjoy a soak under the stars in the hot tub.

An expansive open-plan great room bordered by floor-to-ceiling windows lets you bring the whole family together—and appreciate the mountain views. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the fireplace and flat-screen television, set up a board game on the round table by the window, or toast to a special occasion around the dining table, which has seating for eight. A breakfast bar and gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen make it easy to satisfy après-ski appetites.

The warm contemporary feel of Governors Penthouse 401 continues in the three bedrooms, from a master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom to two bedrooms with a queen bed and bunk beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. In the bathroom, touches like glass-enclosed showers and stand-alone bathtubs with views of their own invite you to linger.

The penthouse is part of the Olympian complex in downtown Steamboat Springs, just a 5-minute drive or seasonal shuttle ride from shopping and dining and 10 minutes from Steamboat Ski Resort. Avid skiers can test their skills on runs that have hosted World Cup competitions, while summer visitors can choose from a wealth of activities ranging from golf and kayaking to rafting on the Yampa River. Not to be missed are the town’s hot springs, whether you take the kids to splash in the pools at Old Town or your sweetheart for a honeymoon-worthy soak at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Flights of fancy fill this fairy-tale-inspired, gorgeously appointed Orlando home with all-ages appeal. Not only are there outdoor entertaining areas built for day and night, there’s even a secret playroom. It all overlooks the golf course in the Reunion gated resort community, 6 miles from Disney World and a short drive from Universal Studios.

Bask in the Florida sunshine on a hotel-worthy deck that has a swimming pool and hot tub, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, and even ping-pong and foosball tables—all shaded by day and heated by night. After a day at the theme parks, stretch out in the private gym before unwinding by the bar, games room, and home theater or challenging friends and family in the superhero-themed arcade.

Polished marble floors and oversized chandeliers make a dramatic statement in the entry, and the sleek style carries through to a spacious great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. The bedrooms and playroom show off the villa’s fun side, though, with themes taken from classic kids’ movies.

For theme-park fun, it’s a 9-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort and less than 20 miles to both Universal Studios Florida.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find a haven of modern luxury in the dramatic Arizona landscape at Oasis Estate. Set in the shadows of the McDonald Mountains and Pinnacle Peaks in North Scottsdale, this gated vacation rental is a private enclave of resort-worthy amenities and charming interiors. Its five bedrooms, including one suite in a guest house, are the right size for a golf getaway with friends or a warm-weather birthday or anniversary celebration with the extended family.

You’ll want to spend most of your holiday in the villa’s incredible backyard, which features an infinity pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, a fireplace and firepit, sound system and, for sportier guests, a volleyball court, ping-pong table and putting green. If you’d like to entertain indoors, a projector screen, Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi make it easy.

With details ranging from carved wooden doors and exposed beams to ornate fireplaces and chandeliers, Oasis Estate blends Southwestern style and European elegance. The rooms radiate out from a central sitting area with a fireplace: a formal dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook, and a media room.

There are four bedrooms in the estate’s main house and one in a guest house that’s ideal for a couple seeking honeymoon-style privacy or in-laws wanting a little more quiet. The main-house master suite has a king bed, queen bed and two en-suite bathrooms; a second bedroom has two queen beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a twin-over-double bunk bed and two queen beds, respectively, and share a bathroom, while the guest house has a king bed and en-suite bathroom.

From Oasis Estate, it’s a 5-minute drive to Pinnacle Peak Park and less than a 10-mile drive to two golf courses and the Tom’s Thumb trailhead. You’ll find plenty of other golf courses and spas within easy reach, as well as shopping and dining in downtown Scottsdale.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Recharge in the peace of the desert with this private and well-equipped Coachella Valley villa. The sun-reflecting pool is ringed by stone seats and shaded lounge areas, with the lofty mountains visible just beyond the villa’s tall palm trees. Relax at the mosaic-tiled villa bar or in the leafy gardens, before taking on local golf courses, wilderness hikes and the local bar and restaurant scene.

Breathe in the balmy desert air from the shaded environs of the plush chairs and sofas of the Noman Estate’s shaded terrace, and plan a day to remember in this famous Californian valley. Guests will appreciate the inventive and colorful decor that runs throughout the vibrant living space, which is decked out in premium furniture, shining glass and polished wood. Air-conditioned bedrooms offer a solid night’s sleep, while the premium barbecue will fire up a delicious meal that can be enjoyed at the social bar outside, as the pool lights shine and stars peek out from the blue/red veil of the evening sky.

Literally 2 minutes from the Coachella Valley Music and Arts site, guests at Nomad Estate can take in the desert landscapes and delightful picnic spots of the Thousand Palms Oasis Preserve. A dizzying selection of premium golf courses are within a 10 minutes drive, ranging from dynamic hillside courses to sweeping valley fairways. After a stimulating walk to a viewpoint in the nearby hills, hit downtown Indio for a delicious Western-style meal and tasty glass of locally-brewed beer or Californian wine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

City permit #20-00025920

listing.listing_description:
Silver Star 41 is fabulous luxury villa located within a year-round alpine playground of Park City. Here, you can ski and snowboard to your heart’s content, while other activity options include winter fly-fishing, hot-air ballooning, snowmobiling, sleigh rides and snow tubing. During the warmer months at Park City, options include zip tours, golf, mountain biking, hiking and horseback riding, to name but a few. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

The outdoor perks at this stunning vacation rental include a private hot tub, barbeque and wet bar. This private holiday home has been loaded with perks such as an espresso machine, satellite television, Wi-Fi and an elevator. Guests will enjoy complimentary access to the five-star amenities of the Silver Star Community including a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, exercise room, cafe and fire pits. Your reservation includes light housekeeping and complimentary shared shuttle service during the winter.

Contemporary, plush and pastel furnishings in the media room offer some real moments to unwind. The formal dining area is casual and comfortable. If you have any special news to share this year, why not do so over a sumptuous meal? The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. Or perhaps it’s just time to curl up with a fresh drink and a good book by the fireplace in the living room?

Four immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The master suite offers a king size bed and a dual shower. You will find another king bed in one suite and two queen beds in another. The bunk room is sure to be a hit with children!

Whether you have come to Utah to ski or golf, you will find everything you require within close reach of this breathtaking chalet. The Park City Golf Club and plenty of options for nature walks and hiking are within easy reach. In the summer, look for outdoor concerts at the magnificent Snow Park Outdoor Amphitheater. Whether for a family holiday, a couples’ retreat or special events such as a wedding or anniversary, get the alpine getaway you deserve!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Old World Tuscan charm, right in the heart of wine country, Villa Nel Bosco is the Sonoma and Napa Valley vacation of your dreams. Located on the mountain road that divides Napa and Sonoma, this luxurious four-bedroom estate is surrounded by over six-hundred wineries, several star-rated restaurants, and some of California’s most iconic scenery. And, if you feel like a trip to the city, San Francisco and Sacramento are both a little over an hour away.

This Tuscan-inspired farmhouse features the authentic shuttered-windows, exposed-beam ceilings, natural stone, and wrought iron fixtures that adorn many of Tuscany’s ancient homes. Inside, soothing earth tones and plush designer furniture will ensure relaxation. Features like the stone fireplace, chandelier lighting, and rustic-chic dining table give Nel Bosco a traditional feel, while high-end electronics and appliances provide modern luxury.

With a view of the vineyard, expertly manicured gardens, and a fire pit/lounge, Nel Bosco’s backyard is a perfect example of the stylish, yet rugged vibe of Napa and Sonoma Valley. In the afternoon, cool off in the swimming pool. At night, switch to the hot tub to warm up and melt your stress away. For dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace; both have seating for eight. Back inside, the villa is equipped with television, a media room, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning.

Nearby, you’ll find plenty of wine tasting opportunities at local vineyards, as well as independent cafes, organic food markets, and lots of interesting restaurants in Glen Ellen. If you’re on vacation in the summer, visit Jack London State Historic Park for Transcendence Theatre’s Broadway Under the Stars, featuring performances in the park’s old winery ruins. For nightlife, downtown Napa is the place to be. If there’s a craft beer fan in your group, Napa Valley Brewing Company is a great place to sample some fresh local brews. For live music, check the local listings at the Uptown Theatre and Silo’s.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Great golf, great views and great company: it's easy to make it all part of a California holiday at Villa Lago. Set on the edge of the lake in the exclusive community at the PGA West Stadium Course, this Desert Cities vacation rental looks out over the lush fairways to the rugged mountains beyond. Nearly 5,000 square feet of living space and four bedrooms mean you can host up to eight friends on a golf getaway or extended family for a sunny stay.

When you're not teeing off, relax in resort-worthy outdoor living areas that feature an infinity pool, hot tub, lounging and dining spaces, a barbecue and even an al-fresco TV. After a day on the golf course, serve drinks from the wet bar and wine cooler, and unwind by the Sonos sound system, cable TV and Wi-Fi.

Nearly wall-to-wall panels of slide-away glass frame the mountain vistas for your enjoyment from an expansive open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas, a breakfast table and a breakfast bar in a fully equipped kitchen. A stacked-stone fireplace and linen-hued fabrics lend the space a serene, natural ambience, while in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances bring state-of-the-art efficiency.

Villa Lago has two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub, gas fireplace and terrace access, and two bedrooms with queen beds. All four bedrooms at this luxury property have private en-suite bathrooms.

Though its lakeside setting feels tranquil, when it comes to activities and attractions, the villa is in the heart of the action. It's a 10-minute drive or less from golf at the Stadium Course at PGA West and Motorcoach Country Club, the grounds of the Coachella festival, and shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta. And if you need to fit in a few more rounds, there are several other golf courses within a 25-mile radius.

License # 765943

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find a contemporary escape amid quintessential wine-country landscape at Bella Vista Sonoma. This sleek, modern retreat sits atop a hill outside Santa Rosa, in a private setting that’s nevertheless just an hour from San Francisco. Like a fine wine with a gourmet meal, its luxury amenities and stunning natural surroundings are the perfect pairing.

You’ll have no trouble slipping into the indoor-outdoor California lifestyle in the villa’s beautifully appointed al-fresco spaces. Spend days swimming in the pool or lounging on the terrace, and evenings tending the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen, cozying up to the fireplace or soaking in the hot tub. Younger guests will want to spend hours in the children’s play area and media room, and for adults, there are toys like an Apple TV and Sonos sound system.

An open-concept layout, dramatic 12-foot ceilings and wraparound windows bring the views to the forefront of the villa’s great room. Gather in the sitting area around the fireplace to watch a favorite film on the retractable movie screen, relive the day’s adventures in dining chairs with mid-century cred or satisfy appetites in a fully equipped kitchen with professional-grade appliances. On warmer evenings, you can also barbecue and dine on the enclosed porch.

The master bedroom at Bella Vista Sonoma is a honeymoon-worthy suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, al-fresco shower and its own balcony. There’s a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and the third bedroom has two twin beds and a shared hall bathroom. Larger parties of extended family or friends on holiday together can also use the guest room, which has a queen sofa bed and shares the hall bathroom.

This one-of-a-kind vacation rental may feel peaceful and remote, but it’s only 15 minutes from shopping, dining and nightlife in Sebastopol and Guerneville, and 20 minutes from Healdsburg. Set a course for Annabel State Park, Sonoma Valley Regional Park or a nearby golf club—or simply drive through Napa and Sonoma, taking in the scenery and stopping at wineries along the way.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Parkite is a high-end condominium project at the heart of Historic Main Street in Park City. Located just a short walk from Town Lift, the state-of-the-art building provides guests with deluxe shared amenities, cutting-edge sustainable design, and luxurious residences to enjoy a private vacation. This exquisite, two-bedroom, two-bath residence is ideal for small families or groups of friends. Features include gorgeous and sumptuous interior living areas, an alfresco deck with private hot tub, and top-of-the-line amenities and appliances, along with access to the Parkite's shared amenities and services.

The alfresco patio invites you to breathe the delicious air, sip wine on the sofa, and gaze on the gorgeous views of the mountains and town. Step into the seven-person hot tub after the day's exertions, and start the grill for a barbeque dinner. On quiet afternoons, relax with a hot cocoa in the charming eggshell swing.

Stepping inside to the open-concept living area, you'll find a comfy and elegant lounge with large TV, ideal for kindling a fire and relaxing with your favorite shows. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with top-shelf appliances, while the dining table is a lovely setting for delicious feasts together. Large windows fill the villa's interior with alpine light, while the décor combines contemporary elegance with classic chalet comfort and charm.

The master suite features a sumptuous king bed, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub, and direct access to the balcony and hot tub. The guest suite includes two lovely queen beds, an ensuite bathroom, and gorgeous sunset views. There is an additional queen sofa bed in the living room

The Parkite enjoys an ample roof deck with two fire pits as well as dining areas. There is also a fitness center and a deluxe lounge in the lobby. Your vacation rental includes one spot in the underground parking garage. Leaving the Parkite, you're about seven minutes on foot from Town Lift and a five-minute drive from the Park City Resort Base. Deer Valley and Brighton are also close by, as is Park City Golf Course, Park Silly Sunday Market, and numerous other attractions that make this city one of the finest ski capitals in the Rocky Mountains.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into luxury at this decadent, central apartment, located in well-regarded Shock Hill, Breckenridge. Outfitted to sharply-contemporary standards, guests can luxuriate amidst stimulating decor, crafted and fashionable furniture, and warm touches like the roaring fireplace. The gondola station for the ski resort is just outside, while the culinary delights of the town are temptingly close by.

After a delightful afternoon on the diverse slopes of the Breckenridge resort, guests can hop off at the gondola station and take just a few steps to return to the exceptionally-outfitted interiors of Falcon Haus. Exposed wooden rafters hang above shining wooden floors, with the large windows ensuring fresh sunlight illuminates the impeccable interior. Self-catering is a joy at this villa, with the modern kitchen’s stone counters helping to make mealtime both pleasant and simple. The sitting room is especially welcoming, with TV perched over the glowing gas fireplace, as the ski-run lights shine in the night beyond.

With access to the resort comprehensively covered, guests have a wealth of other outing options from Falcon Haus, with the central artery of North Park avenue just around the corner. From here, dive into the restaurant, bar and brewery scene of this energetic mountain town, or go beyond, to explore the forest trails, canyons and lakes of the valley, with hiking, kayaking and mountain-biking all very popular options. Try nearby Carter Park for fun sledding outings, with a hot chocolate from a local artisanal cafe to round things off perfectly.

listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: Cancel up to 95 days before your trip and get a full refund. Cancel within 95 days of the trip and the reservation is non-refundable.

listing.listing_description:
Green hills, valleys and vineyards complement the namesake beds of lavender blooming at this quintessential California retreat. The setting puts you 1,600 feet above Sonoma’s Valley of the Moon, and the architecture encourages indoor-outdoor living, whether that’s splashing in the pool or sipping wine on the porch. Glen Ellen, about 7 miles away, has a bevy of wine bars and a state historic park.

The 200 lavender plants perfume the air wafting over the villa’s swimming pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, and garden. As the shadows in the valley grow long, heat up the barbecue for dinner, then bring your wine glasses inside to savour in front of the satellite TV or as you catch up on your feeds over Wi-Fi.

A wraparound porch flanks the open-concept, double-height great room inside this vacation rental. A fireplace with built-in bookshelves makes the sitting area into a cozy corner, as does banquette seating in the dining area. Perch on a stool at the bar in the fully equipped kitchen or, if you’re the cook, watch the valley views out the windows along with whatever you’ve got in the pan.

This luxury property has three queen size beds, two private en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning, making it ideal for groups of three couples, friends, or extended family on holiday together. Neutral-toned bedding is a soft backdrop for landscape paintings and botanical artwork.

Wine lovers will find their joy in the area’s wineries and tasting rooms, and at the wine bars in town. Beyond the vineyards, you can sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a bistro in downtown Glen Ellen, book a horseback ride through the area’s verdant scenery, or follow in the author’s footsteps at Jack London State Historic Park, which was once London’s ranch.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
